019daa232c6c9b7c540bf8a619c095cc97bfee53.query:

                        campaigns_units (id, campaign, class, "group", data)
                    VALUES
                        ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5)
                    ON CONFLICT (id, campaign) DO UPDATE SET
                        class = $3,
                        "group" = $4,
                        data = $5

                                    VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, false)
                                    ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET
                                        name = $2,
                                        summary = $3,
                                        description = $4,
                                        type = $5,
                                        archived = false

1ce18fd17a5b1363ea677cd2d140ecf22f56a8c6.query:
SELECT
                        v.plate,
                        v.id,
                        v.addon,
                        v.stored,
                        s.name,
                        s.class,
                        (SELECT COUNT(base) FROM garage_shop WHERE base = s.id) as addons
                    FROM
                        garage_vehicles v
                    INNER JOIN
                        garage_shop s
                    ON
                        s.id = v.id
                    WHERE plate = $1

1de41f7aead3bb3e5e5923d1d88ea092d9b9faf9.query: INSERT INTO gear_bank_transfers (source, target, amount, reason) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)

                    FROM
                        garage_shop
                    WHERE
                        name Like $1

23c0931c22545ccd5a45119553f7270ed4aa9285.query:
SELECT
                        s.id,
                        s.mission,
                        s.schedule_message_id,
                        s.start,
                        m.name,
                        m.summary,
                        m.description,
                        m.type as "typ: MissionType"
                    FROM
                        missions_schedule s
                    INNER JOIN
                        missions m ON m.id = s.mission
                    WHERE
                        start + '2 minutes'::Interval > NOW() ORDER BY start ASC

26b3ef600e47a97ac4ad2a7c344ea130d2c5d4a6.query: INSERT into garage_log (plate, action, member) VALUES ($1, 'retrieve', $2)

32c2dd476f4e3ec8d7dcecea6fab01004bd6f9a1.query:
SELECT
                        (
                            SELECT
                                class
                            FROM
                                garage_shop s
                            WHERE
                                s.id = COALESCE(v.addon, v.id)
                        ) as class,
                        state
                    FROM
                        garage_vehicles v
                    WHERE
                        v.plate = $1

4edfe285b237cf058a908d498caf1c5c7122a524.query:
SELECT
                        DISTINCT ON (certification)
                        certification,
                        id,
                        instructor,
                        trainee,
                        notes,
                        passed,
                        valid_for,
                        valid_until,
                        created
                    FROM
                        certifications_trials
                    WHERE
                        trainee = $1
                        AND passed IS TRUE
                        AND (valid_until > NOW() OR valid_until IS NULL)
                    ORDER BY certification, created DESC

5e9eeb66a761ef42c35cadb55d03396bbcfa3a64.query:
SELECT
                        v.plate,
                        v.id,
                        v.addon,
                        v.stored,
                        s.name,
                        s.class,
                        (SELECT COUNT(base) FROM garage_shop WHERE base = s.id) as addons
                    FROM
                        garage_vehicles v
                    INNER JOIN
                        garage_shop s
                    ON
                        s.id = v.id
                    WHERE
                        LOWER(plate) LIKE LOWER($1)
                        AND ($2 OR stored = $3)

615bd943426fba715272731444c3f65c1c481967.query:
SELECT
                            DISTINCT ON (trainee, certification)
                            id,
                            instructor,
                            trainee,
                            certification,
                            notes,
                            passed,
                            valid_for,
                            valid_until,
                            created
                        FROM
                            certifications_trials as ct
                        WHERE
                            passed IS TRUE
                            AND (valid_until > NOW())
                            AND valid_until < NOW() + $1 * INTERVAL '1 day'
                            AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM certifications_trials as ict WHERE
                                ct.certification = ict.certification
                                AND ct.trainee = ict.trainee
                                AND valid_until > NOW() + $1 * INTERVAL '1 day')
                        ORDER BY trainee, certification, created DESC

63c4cc9f20515eaa584321e8e71f9dd471573353.query:
SELECT
                        a.id,
                        s.name,
                        s.cost,
                        s.class,
                        s.base
                    FROM
                        garage_addons a
                    INNER JOIN
                        garage_shop s
                    ON
                        s.id = a.id
                    WHERE
                        s.base = (SELECT v.id FROM garage_vehicles v WHERE v.plate = $1)
                        AND a.count > 0

        FROM gear_cost gc
        INNER JOIN gear_items gi on gi.class = gc.class
        WHERE gc.class=ANY($1) AND gi.global = false;

8f1b3a64f6896c75bc1a526ee036f60329b6a0a7.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM reset_kit WHERE member = $1 AND created > NOW() - INTERVAL '13 days') as value

SELECT
                            c.id,
                            c.name,
                            c.link,
                            c.roles_required,
                            c.roles_granted,
                            c.valid_for,
                            c.created
                        FROM
                            certifications c
                        INNER JOIN
                            certifications_instructors ci
                        ON
                            ci.certification = c.id
                        WHERE
                            ci.member = $1

99614f73ba06b3938130f1384ed2b07aabbb143d.query:
WITH ins (id, mission, schedule_message_id, start) AS (
                        INSERT INTO missions_schedule (mission, start) VALUES ($1, $2)
                        RETURNING
                            id,
                            mission,
                            schedule_message_id,
                            start
                    ) SELECT
                        ins.id,
                        ins.mission,
                        ins.schedule_message_id,
                        ins.start,
                        m.name,
                        m.summary,
                        m.description,
                        m.type as "typ: MissionType"
                    FROM
                        ins
                    INNER JOIN
                        missions m ON m.id = ins.mission
                    WHERE ins.start = $2

dc9c428bc346fe4d412c80c129f2612b539bccfa.query:
SELECT
                            EXISTS(
                                SELECT
                                    1
                                FROM
                                    certifications_instructors
                                WHERE
                                    member = $1
                                    AND certification = $2
                            ) AS "instructor_certified!"

dfe8e5e4cf1668fd8d3ec4cb7318d500c80012e6.query:
SELECT SUM(gc.cost * gl.quantity)
        FROM gear_locker gl
        INNER JOIN gear_cost gc ON gc.class = gl.class
        INNER JOIN gear_items gi on gc.class = gi.class
        WHERE gl.member = $1 AND gi.global = false AND gc.priority = 0;

e44bf77aa7feb47efc20fa54fa81fe1caa7295b3.query: SELECT class, quantity FROM gear_locker WHERE member = $1

e7d589eb146c1c1d5b3918ba996ca7677b1c185e.query: INSERT INTO reputation_events (member, event, reputation, data) VALUES ($1, 'friendly_healed', 1, $2)

SELECT
                        s.id,
                        s.mission,
                        s.schedule_message_id,
                        s.start,
                        m.name,
                        m.summary,

                        m.type as "typ: MissionType"

                    INNER JOIN
                        missions m ON m.id = s.mission
                    WHERE schedule_message_id = $1

                            member AS value
                        FROM
                            members_steam
                        WHERE
                            steam = $1

ed029c4fa87ff5b45fbfdf0ad1f312c2f34061bc.query: SELECT id, name, summary, description, type as "typ: MissionType" FROM missions WHERE archived = FALSE AND (LOWER(missions.name) LIKE LOWER($1) OR LOWER(missions.id) LIKE LOWER($1)) ORDER BY name ASC

ee6c8f44f664174c4ae6d35fa1fb17f712ecd477.query: INSERT INTO gear_bank_deposits (member, amount, reason, id, created) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5)

f0d9a82c4470a00b29f5a917307355df412c56ce.query: SELECT id,name FROM certifications c WHERE first_kit IS NOT NULL AND c.id NOT IN (SELECT cert FROM reset_kit WHERE MEMBER = $1) AND c.id IN (SELECT certification FROM certifications_trials WHERE trainee = $1 AND passed IS TRUE and (valid_until> NOW() or valid_until IS NULL))

f37802ab91519a9f9ac3f828cee5dbcb53152b20.query: INSERT INTO reputation_events (member, event, reputation, data) VALUES ($1, 'mission_completed', $2, $3)

f5b692014ca1b4e3f766bf51edfeb416499212bd.query:
SELECT
                        s.id,
                        s.mission,
                        s.schedule_message_id,
                        s.start,
                        m.name,
                        m.summary,
                        m.description,
                        m.type as "typ: MissionType"
                    FROM
                        missions_schedule s
                    INNER JOIN
                        missions m ON m.id = s.mission
                    WHERE
                        (LOWER(m.name) = LOWER($1) OR ($3 AND s.mission = '$SUBCON$')) AND
                        (start > $2 and start < $2 + '2 Day'::INTERVAL)
                    ORDER BY
                        mission DESC

f667b03c67b42ae2f957d73340685fe9255b8147.query:
SELECT
                        s.id,
                        s.mission,
                        s.schedule_message_id,
                        s.start,
                        m.name,
                        m.summary,
                        m.description,
                        m.type as "typ: MissionType"
                    FROM
                        missions_schedule s
                    INNER JOIN
                        missions m ON m.id = s.mission
                    WHERE
                        s.start <= NOW() AND s.start + INTERVAL '150 minutes' >= NOW()
                    ORDER BY
                        s.start ASC
                    LIMIT 1
